kpa.model

Class Histogram

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.AbstractMap<K,V>
      • java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Integer>
        • kpa.model.Histogram
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Integer>

    public class Histogram
extends java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Integer>
    A histogram of cell states, counting how often each state occurs in a group.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
    Invariant:
    For each possible cell state, a count is maintained

      • adjust

        public void adjust(int state,
                   int delta)
        Adjusts the count for a given state.
        Parameters:
        state - state whose count changes
        delta - the amount of change
        Precondition:
        true
        Modifies:
        this
        Postcondition:
        get(state) == \old(get(state) + delta) &&
        (\forall CellState s; s != state; get(s) == \old(get(s)))
